biotools.summary: R-based suite that calculates, analyses, and plots the frequency of C. elegans swimming behavior over time. It places a particular emphasis on identifying paralysis and quantifying the kinetic elements of paralysis during swimming. Data is inputted from a custom built program that fits a 5 point morphometric spine to videos of single worms swimming in a buffer called Worm Tracker.

bioschemas.name: SwimR

Data is inputted from a custom built program that fits a 5 point morphometric spine to videos of single worms swimming in a buffer called Worm Tracker.
